text: An la yindao shei, shei jiushi zunxun zhengdao de; an la shi shei mi wu, ni buneng wei shei faxian an la yiwai de baohu zhe. Zai fuhuo ri, wo jiang shi tamen you xia you ya you long de pufuzhe jihe qilai, tamen de guisu shi huo yu. Mei dang huoshi jianruo de shihou, wo zengjia tamen de huoyan
